labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: the blue circle does not appear on your right hand side of the task bar(if at the top or bottom)
data.expected_result: the blue circle should appear when not in a voice Channel
data.short_description: Discord does not show unread messages Icon on the Task Bar
data.steps_to_repro: - look for unread servers/channels/DM - don't be in a voice channel - notice the the Discord icon is not showing the blue circle showing you have unread messages
